name: Main Leaderboard
description: Ranking of purple agents by pass rate
query: SELECT purple_agent_id as id, purple_agent_name, COUNT(*) as total_tasks, SUM(CASE WHEN task_passed THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as tasks_passed FROM read_json_auto('results/*.json') GROUP BY purple_agent_id, purple_agent_name ORDER BY tasks_passed DESC
